short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blocks access to websites (as per keywords user specifies) to improve productivity.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
KEY BLOCKER is a simple website or site blocker.

Features:
🔏 No data is stolen by the extension as all the processing happens at client side.
🧾 No more accessing user browsing data
🔃 Synchronized among all Chromes in other signed-in devices.
🍀 Simple user experience.
📁 < 1MB size

More features may be incorporated based on your feedback.
